song_name: Can't Have Mine (Find You A Girl)
lyrics:
3 contributorscan’t have mine find you a girl lyricsverse 1
you could find you a girl on a friday night
dancin in the back of a bar
a sunday morning hands up high singing front row in the choir
you could find you a girl through a friend of a friend
or she could show up right out of the blue
it dont matter where you find her
just as long as you

chorus
find you a girl that leaves you speechless
gets wild on the town but still loves jesus
one thats worth the wait even when she aint on time
find you a girl that loves her daddy
talkin bout babies makes her happy
yeah take it from me thats the kind you need to find
you just cant have mine

verse 2
find you a girl that likes to do all the things you love to do
and even on your worst day
she still thinks you hung thе moon
find you a girl thats like fine wine that just gеts better with age
boy youll have it made

chorus
if you find you a girl that leaves you speechless
gets wild on the town but still loves jesus
one thats worth the wait even when she aint on time
find you a girl that loves her daddy
talkin bout babies makes her happy
yeah take it from me thats the kind you need to find
you just cant have mine
see dylan scott liveget tickets as low as 28you might also likebridge
thank god she loves me
god knows i got so lucky
if you want one like i got you gotta trust me

chorus
find you a girl that leaves you speechless
gets wild on the town but still loves jesus
one thats worth the wait even when she aint on time
find you a girl that loves her daddy
and talkin bout babies makes her happy
yeah take it from me thats the kind you need to find
you just cant have mine
